Name: Gloom Chaser (Savoy)
Ingredients: 25 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A sunny coloured drink for happy souls. And sweet orange and pomegranate soured with lemon would make anyone happy.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Gloom Chaser (Savoy) contains 152 calories
